thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Katie Boyce

author: Katie Boyce
title: Katie Boyce
text:
The website is simple and easy to use, we posted a request for a house sitter and received enquiries within 24 hours. Every enquiry to house sit was genuine and everyone seemed incredibly trustworthy (something we were apprehensive about!).
Once we chose our housesitter, we communicated via Skype and the website, and left her a house guide on their as well.
This service is a great way to meet trustworthy, honest people to take care of your home. Cannot recommend it enough.
